We got the CF, the IF, and now the BF. I'm going to bed. Goodnight 
everyone!

::Crater::

Crater nods, following Dragonfly. "I wou.." he begins but is 
interrupted by Dragonfly's exclamation. He looks over at 
Blacknightmare and Orchestra.

Never having seen anything like that before, Crater found it quite 
strange. He turns to Dragonfly. "Exuse me, but what exactly are those 
two doing?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Dragonfly::
> 
> "How rude!!!" exclamed Dragonfly when Orchestra ignored him
> 
> "Well... we're in BlackFortress" said the male to Crater when he 
saw 
> BF's defences down and while he landed and walked towards the 
base"I 
> don't know what do you want to do... but I have to get some bombs 
to 
> Master's plans -Hey do you like kill some bots? we have a battle 
> around and you can come in, we just do something before... Er 
> Blacknightmare, he... By all dragons!!! " said while Dragonfly 
looked 
> to Orchestra and Blacknightmare "It seems that someone tamed the 
> tameless-lady... Darkfate won't like this..."
